title: Throne of Teresh
description: When she’s forced to become queen after the untimely death of her father, Thiera must survive assassination attempts, uncover the betrayers behind a plot to remove her from the throne, and choose between the love of two extraordinary men. One of Thiera’s admirers is the man she should love, Erol, the perfect suitor for a queen. He’s a charming soldier who finds her bumbling ways adorable and saves her from more than one embarrassing situation.However, despite Erol’s attentions, Theira is drawn to the forbidden love of her guardian, Leaf. A man from a race of people shrouded in secrets and mystery, he’s the one who has watched over her, protected her and trained her for the past five years. He is also the only person she has ever called friend.But when Thiera is kidnapped by the king of a neighboring nation, her romantic struggles take a backseat as her very survival is put in jeopardy. Struggling to free herself, she discovers the amazing strengths she possesses that may not only save her own people from domination, but prevent the annihilation of her guardian’s race as well. Along the way, she also learns that true love is worth fighting for, no matter what obstacles stand in its way.
author: Shirelle Higgins
